verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> also came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֖רִי <S%H4805><s%> of a rebellious אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you יֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> thou dwellest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עֵינַיִם֩ <S%H5869><s%> which have eyes לָהֶ֨ם לִרְא֜וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not רָא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see אָזְנַ֨יִם <S%H241><s%> not they have ears לָהֶ֤ם לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> to hear וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> and hear כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> not for they [are] a rebellious הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> prepare לְךָ֙ כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> thee stuff גוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> for removing וּגְלֵ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> and remove יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> in their sight וְגָלִ֨יתָ <S%H1540><s%> and thou shalt remove מִמְּקוֹמְךָ֜ <S%H4725><s%> from thy place אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place אַחֵר֙ <S%H312><s%> to another לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> in their sight אוּלַ֣י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יִרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> it may be they will consider כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> though בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <S%H3318><s%> Then shalt thou bring forth כֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H3627><s%> thy stuff כִּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> as stuff גוֹלָ֛ה <S%H1473><s%> for removing יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> in their sight וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> and thou shalt go forth בָעֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H6153><s%> at even לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> in their sight כְּמוֹצָאֵ֖י <S%H4161><s%> as they that go forth גּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> into captivity
לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> in their sight חֲתָר־ <S%H2864><s%> Dig לְךָ֣ בַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> thou through the wall וְהוֹצֵאתָ֖ <S%H3318><s%> and carry out בּֽוֹ׃

לְעֵ֨ינֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> In their sight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּתֵ֤ף <S%H3802><s%> [it] upon [thy] shoulders תִּשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> shalt thou bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <S%H5939><s%> in the twilight תוֹצִ֔יא <S%H3318><s%> [and] carry [it] forth פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face תְכַסֶּ֔ה <S%H3680><s%> thou shalt cover וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you cannot תִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> that thou see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> not the ground כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> as מוֹפֵ֥ת <S%H4159><s%> thee [for] a sign נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> for I have set לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וָאַ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And I did כֵּן֮ <S%H3651><s%> so כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I צֻוֵּיתִי֒ <S%H6680><s%> so as I was commanded כֵּ֠לַי <S%H3627><s%> my stuff הוֹצֵ֜אתִי <S%H3318><s%> I brought forth כִּכְלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> as stuff גוֹלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> for captivity יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> by day וּבָעֶ֛רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and in the even חָתַֽרְתִּי־ <S%H2864><s%> I digged לִ֥י בַקִּ֖יר <S%H7023><s%> through the wall בְּיָ֑ד <S%H3027><s%> with mine hand בָּעֲלָטָ֥ה <S%H5939><s%> in the twilight הוֹצֵ֛אתִי <S%H3318><s%> I brought [it] forth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּתֵ֥ף <S%H3802><s%> [it] upon [my] shoulder נָשָׂ֖אתִי <S%H5375><s%> [and] I bare לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in their sight פ

וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> came the word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> in בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> And in the morning לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not אָמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> has not בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> hath not the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑רִי <S%H4805><s%> the rebellious מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> What עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto thee What doest

אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> thou unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הַנָּשִׂ֞יא <S%H5387><s%> [concerneth] the prince הַמַּשָּׂ֤א <S%H4853><s%> This burden הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> This בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> that [are] among

אֱמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am מֽוֹפֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H4159><s%> I [am] your sign כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to you עָשִׂ֗יתִי <S%H6213><s%> like as I have done כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> so יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> so shall it be done לָהֶ֔ם בַּגּוֹלָ֥ה <S%H1473><s%> unto them they shall remove בַשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> will go

וְהַנָּשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּתוֹכָ֜ם <S%H8432><s%> that [is] among אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּתֵ֤ף <S%H3802><s%> upon [his] shoulder יִשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> them shall bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <S%H5939><s%> in the twilight וְיֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> and shall go forth בַּקִּ֥יר <S%H7023><s%> through the wall יַחְתְּר֖וּ <S%H2864><s%> they shall dig לְה֣וֹצִיא <S%H3318><s%> to carry out ב֑וֹ פָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> his face יְכַסֶּ֔ה <S%H3680><s%> thereby he shall cover יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> he see לַעַ֛יִן <S%H5869><s%> with [his] eyes ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> not the ground

וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <S%H6566><s%> also will I spread אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִשְׁתִּי֙ <S%H7568><s%> My net עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> over וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <S%H8610><s%> upon him and he shall be taken בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <S%H4686><s%> in my snare וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <S%H935><s%> and I will bring אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָבֶ֙לָה֙ <S%H894><s%> him to Babylon אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [to] the land כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans וְאוֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> yet shall he not see וְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> it though he shall die

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> to every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיבֹתָ֥יו <S%H5439><s%> all that [are] about [עֶזְרֹה כ] (עֶזְרֹ֛ו <S%H5828><s%> help ק) וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲגַפָּ֖יו <S%H102><s%> him and all his bands אֱזָרֶ֣ה <S%H2219><s%> And I will scatter לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> toward every wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword אָרִ֥יק <S%H7324><s%> and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> And they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בַּהֲפִיצִ֤י <S%H6327><s%> when I shall scatter אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> them among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <S%H2219><s%> and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> them in the countries

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֤י <S%H3498><s%> But I will leave מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> a מִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> a few מֵחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of them from the sword מֵרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> from the famine וּמִדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and from the pestilence לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יְסַפְּר֜וּ <S%H5608><s%> that they may declare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8441><s%> all their abominations בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> whither they come שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came to me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man לַחְמְךָ֖ <S%H3899><s%> thy bread בְּרַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> with quaking תֹּאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> eat וּמֵימֶ֕יךָ <S%H4325><s%> thy water בְּרָגְזָ֥ה <S%H7269><s%> with trembling וּבִדְאָגָ֖ה <S%H1674><s%> and with carefulness תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drink

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H127><s%> of the land כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H776><s%> [and] of the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַחְמָם֙ <S%H3899><s%> their bread בִּדְאָגָ֣ה <S%H1674><s%> with carefulness יֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> They shall eat וּמֵֽימֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4325><s%> their water בְּשִׁמָּמ֣וֹן <S%H8078><s%> with astonishment יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink לְמַ֜עַן <S%H4616><s%> because תֵּשַׁ֤ם <S%H3456><s%> may be desolate אַרְצָהּ֙ <S%H776><s%> that her land מִמְּלֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> from all that is therein מֵחֲמַ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> because of the violence כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> of all them that dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְהֶעָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> And the cities הַנּֽוֹשָׁבוֹת֙ <S%H3427><s%> that are inhabited תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <S%H2717><s%> shall be laid waste וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land שְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הַמָּשָׁ֤ל <S%H4912><s%> what [is] that proverb הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is this לָכֶ֔ם עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> you have concerning אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> [that] ye have in the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying יַֽאַרְכוּ֙ <S%H748><s%> are prolonged הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> The days וְאָבַ֖ד <S%H6><s%> faileth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every חָזֽוֹן׃ <S%H2377><s%> and every vision
